item.title: Mamba 논문 리뷰
item.description: @@ 현재 블로그 시험용으로 작성된 글입니다. 추후에 제대로 된 내용이 추가될 예정입니다. 감사합니다. @@ “Mamba”,“SSM”,“State Space Model”,“Transformer”,“LLM”

item.title: About
item.description: Minjae Park 🔍 Research Interests State-Space Model, Model compression(Pruning, Quantization) 🏫 Education Sogang University (2020.03 ~ 2024.02) B.S in Electrical & Electronics Engineering Pohang University of Science and Technology (POSTECH) (2024.03 ~ Present) M.S. & Ph.D candidate in Electrical & Electronics Engineering 🏢 Experience (2023.06 ~ 2023.12) Research Intern, Man Machine Interface Lab, Sogang University 📞 Contact mail : minjae0047@postech.ac.kr, mjae.park@gmail.com github : https://github.com/tada0347/ Social accounts : linkedin
